archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0923
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a finance user, I am able to cross check the billed amount back to an agreed price list.

properties.value: Does it related to verification if the price was calculated correctly? Would you like to have a report? DX response: We would like to be able to check that prices customers are billed at agree to a price list, and there are controls around how the prices are set in the billing system. Possibility to query sample invoices and sample product catalogue/product inventory prices for manual verification + access to the system.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
